channel.title: CVE Feed for wpmudev -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpmudev -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2438|2024-08-03T00:39:07.845Z -- wpmudev -- broken%20link%20checker
item.description: The Broken Link Checker plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to deserialization of untrusted input via the '$log_file' value in versions up to, and including 1.11.16. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with administrative privileges and above to call files using a PHAR wrapper that will deserialize the data and call arbitrary PHP Objects that can be used to perform a variety of malicious actions granted a POP chain is also present. It also requires that the attacker is successful in uploading a file with the serialized payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-0368|2024-08-02T20:39:27.616Z -- wpmudev -- hustle%20%E2%80%93%20email%20marketing%2C%20lead%20generation%2C%20optins%2C%20popups
item.description: The Hustle – Email Marketing, Lead Generation, Optins, Popups plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 7.8.3 via hardcoded API Keys. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including PII.

item.title: CVE-2023-3352|2024-08-02T06:55:01.144Z -- wpmudev -- smush%20image%20optimization%20%E2%80%93%20optimize%20images%20%7C%20compress%20%26%20lazy%20load%20images%20%7C%20convert%20webp%20%7C%20image%20cdn
item.description: The Smush plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized deletion of the resmush list due to a missing capability check on the delete_resmush_list() function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with minimal permissions such as a subscriber, to delete the resmush list for Nextgen or the Media Library.

item.title: CVE-2024-5191|2024-08-01T21:03:11.039Z -- wpmudev -- branda%20%E2%80%93%20white%20label%20wordpress%2C%20custom%20login%20page%20customizer
item.description: The Branda – White Label WordPress, Custom Login Page Customizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘mime_types’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.17 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6554|2024-08-01T21:41:03.498Z -- wpmudev -- branda%20%E2%80%93%20white%20label%20wordpress%2C%20custom%20login%20page%20customizer
item.description: The Branda – White Label WordPress, Custom Login Page Customizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Full Path Disclosure in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.18. This is due the plugin utilizing composer without preventing direct access to the files. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full path of the web application, which can be used to aid other attacks. The information displayed is not useful on its own, and requires another vulnerability to be present for damage to an affected website.

item.title: CVE-2024-6556|2024-08-01T21:41:03.684Z -- wpmudev -- smartcrawl%20wordpress%20seo%20checker%2C%20seo%20analyzer%2C%20seo%20optimizer
item.description: The SmartCrawl WordPress SEO checker, SEO analyzer, SEO optimizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Full Path Disclosure in all versions up to, and including, 3.10.8. This is due the plugin utilizing mobiledetect without preventing direct access to the files. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full path of the web application, which can be used to aid other attacks. The information displayed is not useful on its own, and requires another vulnerability to be present for damage to an affected website.

item.title: CVE-2024-3053|2024-08-01T19:32:42.567Z -- wpmudev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: The Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘id’ forminator_form shortcode attribute in versions up to, and including, 1.29.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2023-3352|2024-07-30T14:15:04.569Z -- wpmudev -- smush%20image%20optimization%20%E2%80%93%20optimize%20images%20%7C%20compress%20%26%20lazy%20load%20images%20%7C%20convert%20webp%20%7C%20image%20cdn
item.description: The Smush plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized deletion of the resmush list due to a missing capability check on the delete_resmush_list() function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with minimal permissions such as a subscriber, to delete the resmush list for Nextgen or the Media Library.

The information displayed is not useful on its own, and requires another vulnerability to be present for damage to an affected website.

item.title: CVE-2024-6556|2024-07-10T08:32:16.591Z -- wpmudev -- smartcrawl%20wordpress%20seo%20checker%2C%20seo%20analyzer%2C%20seo%20optimizer
item.description: The SmartCrawl WordPress SEO checker, SEO analyzer, SEO optimizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Full Path Disclosure in all versions up to, and including, 3.10.8. This is due the plugin utilizing mobiledetect without preventing direct access to the files. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full path of the web application, which can be used to aid other attacks. The information displayed is not useful on its own, and requires another vulnerability to be present for damage to an affected website.

item.title: CVE-2024-5191|2024-06-21T06:58:19.215Z -- wpmudev -- branda%20%E2%80%93%20white%20label%20wordpress%2C%20custom%20login%20page%20customizer
item.description: The Branda – White Label WordPress, Custom Login Page Customizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘mime_types’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.17 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1794|2024-06-04T18:01:29.072Z -- wpmudev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: The Forminator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via an uploaded file (e.g. 3gpp file) in all versions up to, and including, 1.29.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-0368|2024-03-13T15:27:21.681Z -- wpmudev -- hustle%20%E2%80%93%20email%20marketing%2C%20lead%20generation%2C%20optins%2C%20popups
item.description: The Hustle – Email Marketing, Lead Generation, Optins, Popups plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 7.8.3 via hardcoded API Keys. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including PII.

item.title: CVE-2024-3287|2024-05-02T16:52:26.946Z -- wpmudev -- smartcrawl%20wordpress%20seo%20checker%2C%20seo%20analyzer%2C%20seo%20optimizer
item.description: The SmartCrawl WordPress SEO checker, SEO analyzer, SEO optimizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized ld+json description injection due to a missing capability check on the save_settings function in all versions up to, and including, 3.10.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save schema types.

item.title: CVE-2024-3287|2024-08-01T20:05:08.362Z -- wpmudev -- smartcrawl%20wordpress%20seo%20checker%2C%20seo%20analyzer%2C%20seo%20optimizer

This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save schema types.

item.title: CVE-2024-7389|2024-08-02T04:29:55.281Z -- wpmudev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: The Forminator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.29.1 via class-forminator-addon-hubspot-wp-api.php. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract the HubSpot integration developer API key and make unauthorized changes to the plugin's HubSpot integration or expose personally identifiable information from plugin users using the HubSpot integration.

item.title: CVE-2024-7389|2024-08-02T14:00:25.375Z -- wpmudev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: The Forminator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.29.1 via class-forminator-addon-hubspot-wp-api.php. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract the HubSpot integration developer API key and make unauthorized changes to the plugin's HubSpot integration or expose personally identifiable information from plugin users using the HubSpot integration.
